title: Indian chutney
ingredients: ['450g (1 lb) cooking apples, peeled and chopped', '50g (2oz) salt', '580ml (1 pint) malt vinegar', '450g (1 lb) soft brown sugar', '225g (1/2 lb) sultanas', '110g (1/4 lb) raisins', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped red chilli or 1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon curry powder']
